author: cms-AlCaDB
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags 
 
## RunII simulation 
 
   * **RunII Proton-Lead scenario** : [81X_mcRun2_pA_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_pA_v7) as [81X_mcRun2_pA_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_pA_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_pA_v7/81X_mcRun2_pA_v5): 
      * Updated L1 menu to `L1Menu_HeavyIons2016_v3_m2_xml` 
      * Updated HLT Jet Energy Corrections with new L2L3Residual step for 8 TeV pPb HLT where L1FastJet L2Relative and L3Absolute are taken from `JetCorrectorParametersCollection_HLT_BX25_V11_MC_AK4PFHLT` and `JetCorrectorParametersCollection_HLT_BX25_V11_MC_AK4CaloHLT`

solves issue reported at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16606#issuecomment-262253173 

tested with: `runTheMatrix.py -l 281.0`

attn: @Martin-Grunewald @silviodonato
title: update the pA simulation GT to take latest L1T menu and HLT JECs
